mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_vote (normalized_menu_name, vote_type, session_id, created_at) VALUES (#{normalizedMenuName}, #{voteType}, #{sessionId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, normalized_menu_name AS normalizedMenuName, vote_type AS voteType, session_id AS sessionId, created_at AS createdAt FROM menu_vote WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
